name: System32 Must Die
description:
The year is 2006. Viruses and malware are slowing your computer down to a crawl. Your ability to look at cat pictures severely impaired, you turn to the internet for help. After consulting with several computer experts, you have been informed that the only way to fix it is to delete a folder known as "System 32". You enter the C directory, then windows... and there it is. You step inside.....

Controls: Move-WASD    Look-Mouse    Fire-Left click    Jump-Space

Made for 7dfps (7 day first person shooter) 2014.

For me it was more like "4 day FPS while ill in bed" but I still enjoyed myself!

It was my first time making an FPS as well, so I learnt a lot. Might come back to this and finish it properly at some point.
